title: Beautiful Teen Disappears From Own Bedroom After Texting "I'm Scared," Body Just Found
itunes:title: Beautiful Teen Disappears From Own Bedroom After Texting "I'm Scared," Body Just Found
description:
The family of 15-year-old, Riley Crossman, assumes she walked to school just like every other day. Panic sets in when they get the call that she never arrived. After her body is found in the woods of West Virginia, police arrest a man who was let into her home.

Nancy's Expert Panel Weighs In:

Karen Smith:   Forensics expert

Darryl Cohen: Criminal Defense Attorney

Ashley Kelly:  Licensed Clinical Social Worker

Dr. Michelle Dupre: South Carolina Medical Examiner

David Mack:   Syndicated Radio Host


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
